summary: x86/kexec: Fix double-free of elf header buffer
details:
x86/kexec: Fix double-free of elf header buffer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.19 by commit fbdbf8ac333d3d47c0d9ea81d7d445654431d100, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit b3e34a47f98974d0844444c5121aaff123004e57. For more details please see the references link.
